episodes.title: Lift Off
episodes.plot: Dr Vikram Sarabhai prepares for a rocket launch, only to learn that the entire space programme may be in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Dr Homi Bhabha prepares to fight for his dreams but is forced to battle for his life.

episodes.title: Burden Of Proof
episodes.plot: Vikram's ambition falters before it can take off and he struggles to break ground. Mrinalini takes a bold step to claim her right. In the meantime, Homi's actions force the enemy's hand.

episodes.title: A Lasting Legacy
episodes.plot: The nation grieves a great loss and a shift of power is orchestrated as political vultures close ranks. Homi and Vikram are forced to take sides. In the face of an uncertain future, will they continue to choose country over self?

episodes.title: The Price Of War
episodes.plot: Homi faces opposition on all fronts as he races against time, while Indira struggles to come out of her father's towering shadow. In the meantime, Vikram and Mrinalini battle on the home front while the country faces the threat of another war.

episodes.title: Behind Enemy Lines
episodes.plot: India's nuclear future is on the line as Homi throws caution to the winds and takes the enemy head on. Meanwhile, Vikram contemplates forgiveness as the rift between him and Homi grows wider.

episodes.title: Power Over Peace
episodes.plot: Vikram takes on a new role, one that is in direct conflict with all his beliefs. As he looks to the future with hope, he is forced to reckon with the past and the secrets buried in it.

episodes.title: The Last Guard
episodes.plot: A wondrous new chapter begins in India's satellite programme, while Homi's plans for the country's nuclear future start to take shape. But an unforeseen tragedy throws everything off balance.

episodes.title: Smiling Buddha
episodes.plot: In the greatest race against time, India and its scientists have just 8 hours to pull off an impossible feat.
